Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the appointment of members of the Battery Park city authority
Summary: Relates to the appointment of members of the Battery Park city authority; increases the number of members to nine; requires five of the nine members be primary residents of Battery Park city.
LawCode: Amd ยง1973, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the appointment of members of the Battery Park city authority
